summary: This document is a corporate resolution from Jeepers, Inc. appointing Maria Tankenson Hodge as the resident agent for service of legal process in the U.S. Virgin Islands. The resolution was unanimously consented to by the board of directors, including Jeffrey Epstein, who is identified as the President of the Corporation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of Jeepers, Inc. and is involved in the corporate resolution process.

persons.name: Maria Tankenson Hodge
persons.context: Maria Tankenson Hodge is appointed as the resident agent for service of legal process in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Cecile DeJongh
persons.context: Cecile DeJongh is mentioned as a witness to the resolution, indicating her involvement in the corporate documentation.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein, as President of Jeepers, Inc., appoints Maria Tankenson Hodge as the resident agent.
Cecile DeJongh serves as a witness to the corporate resolution involving Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Appointment of Resident Agent
events.description: The board of directors of Jeepers, Inc. unanimously consented to appoint Maria Tankenson Hodge as the resident agent for legal process.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the President of Jeepers, Inc.
Maria Tankenson Hodge was appointed as the resident agent for legal process.
The resolution was unanimously consented to by the board of directors.
Cecile DeJongh is mentioned as a witness to the resolution.
